snippet.title: Blackthorn Arena: Reforged | Release Date Trailer | Coming October 23
snippet.description:
Blackthorn Arena: Reforged, the immersive gladiator management and simulation game, launches on October 23 for PC.

Step into the shoes of an arena master as you train and manage a team of fierce gladiators, conquer arenas, and navigate the brutal politics of the ancient world. With over 30 hours of gameplay, enhanced graphics, and all DLCs included, Blackthorn Arena: Reforged delivers the definitive gladiator experience.

Assemble your team, claim your glory, and dominate the arena!

Visit our Steam page for more info: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3168260

Join our Discord at: https://discord.gg/bNnQtBUKXA

Follow Blackthorn Arena:
X/Twitter: https://x.com/@BlackthornArena
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/blackthornarena/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/blackthornarena/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@blackthorn.arena

#BlackthornArena #GladiatorGames #indiegames
